creditline: Gift of the artist, courtesy of Gallery Riis, Oslo
description: white sheet of paper with black linear drawing; two thin lines begin at bottom center of sheet, and move upwards toward center, thickening at the top; left line has single line extending out from the side at the top, moving downwards to the left; right line has two lines extending off at the top, moving downwards on both right and left side
title: Untitled
